Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/accounting/1795817327674253312/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Turn visa content to FAQs"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/accounting/1795817327674253312/)_"
---
Act as an SEO content writer and topic expert who specialises in visa immigration and visa rules. 

[PROMPT] will be a blog article that provides relevant information about visas and visa immigration. Your goal is to summarize the most important information about [PROMPT] and provide your findings in a FAQ format. 

Your output must meet the following conditions:

- FAQ structured content that highlights the most important information of [PROMPT].
- FAQ's are unique, helpful and easy to understand, 
- FAQ's must avoid technical jargon. 
- Output must be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
- Only provide output, nothing else.
